sentences.english: Certainly from a carbon footprint standpoint.
sentences.chinese: 從碳足跡的角度來看，扎啤當然是最環保的。

sentences.english: But until now most of the work was on classifying the tracks.
sentences.chinese: 但直到現在，大多數工作仍然還是給足跡分類。

sentences.english: For all his star-gazing, Sir Arthur's feet were firmly on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 儘管他耽於幻想，亞瑟爵士的足跡卻是堅實的。

sentences.english: The larger footprint yields a roomier rear seat and trunk.
sentences.chinese: 較大的足跡產生一個寬敞的後座和軀幹。

sentences.english: I found some slick little trails out in our garden down under some tall hollyhocks.
sentences.chinese: 在花園裏幾株高高的蜀葵下面，我發現了細小的足跡。

sentences.english: Blossoming flowers are overspreading our embracing footprints.
sentences.chinese: 山花爛漫鋪滿着我們相守相擁的足跡。

sentences.english: Would knowing the carbon footprint of food items affect your decision-making?
sentences.chinese: 瞭解食品中的碳足跡會影響你對食品的選擇嗎？

sentences.english: In his spare time he has traveled to all seven continents. Follow him on Twitter @cqchoi.
sentences.chinese: 空餘時間，他足跡遍佈七大洲。

sentences.english: This footprint damages and depletes almost everything in its path.
sentences.chinese: 這些足跡所到之處破壞並耗盡了幾乎一切資源。

sentences.english: Pastoralists suffering, you can plateau in India under the footprint of this piece?
sentences.chinese: 苦難的牧民，你可曾在這片高原印下足跡？

sentences.english: During his lifetime, Xu Xiahe visited 16 provinces, leaving his footsteps everywhere across the land.
sentences.chinese: 徐霞客一生考察了十六個省，足跡幾乎遍及全國。

sentences.english: This home uses only the most energy-efficient appliances, further reducing its energy footprint.
sentences.chinese: 這間房子只使用最節能的家電，進一步減少了碳足跡。

sentences.english: It will have a 1, 000-nautical-mile footprint over the Indian Ocean region.
sentences.chinese: 在印度洋地區，該衛星的足跡將會遍佈1000海里。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the applicable common surfaces of amido black for develop latent blood footprints.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究氨基黑顯現潛血足跡所適用的常見客體。

sentences.english: Looking back, footmarks are barely to be seen.
sentences.chinese: 回首走過的足跡，卻總是如此的模糊。

sentences.english: Sometimes the trail was blotted out by new-fallen snow.
sentences.chinese: 有時足跡又被新落下的雪蓋沒。

definition: to seek by inquiry or search/to call on/to visit
to have a taste of/to realize/to appreciate
to seek knowledge/to study/to attend college
